body.name: PAVILIA Toiletry Bag for Men, Travel Essentials Shaving Dopp Kit, Mens Travel Bag Toiletries Organizer Case for Grooming, PU Leather Water Resistant Cosmetic Bag Pouch (Dark Brown)

features: MENS TOILETRY BAG: This functional PU leather toiletry travel bag has a large compartment and side pockets with additional pockets to hold all your toiletry, shaving, and grooming accessories. Equipped with elastic bands and additional mesh pockets to keep your hygiene items secured while traveling or at home, this cosmetic make up case will help you stay organized.

LARGE OPENING TOILETRIES TRAVEL BAG: This toiletry bag organizer has double zipper design that allows for easy access to the large main compartment. With one simple pull on the handle, you can easily access key accessories such as shaving kit, tooth brush, and shampoo. This toiletry travel bag has the convenient design that helps you stay organized and makes this travel bag case an essentials during any traveling, flights, hotel stay, and weekend vacation.

WATER RESISTANT TOILETRY BAG DOPP KIT: This toiletry case kit is made from high density PU leather with added side padding for durability and extra protection to keep your toiletries safe and protected during travel. The lining is water-resistant to prevent liquid splashes from entering the bag or luggage. The toiletry bag also offers excellent wet/dry separation so you can keep wet accessories in a separate compartment from dry toiletries during camping, road trips, weekenders.

TRAVEL ESSENTIALS FOR MEN: The handle has a clip-on buckle to easily attach any bathroom bars and hangers so you can easily access this travel organizer in hotel rooms, bathroom, and showers. Its compact design means the toiletry bag is easy to pack and fits well in luggage and backpacks. This makes a great gift for father, men, boyfriend, uncle, husband, groomsmen and is especially appropriate for fathers day, Christmas, Birthday and those who love to travel.

LARGE CAPACITY TOILETRY TRAVELING BAG: Measures 10.5 x 5.5 x 6 inches (L x W x H), the toiletry bag is large and roomy with ample room to store all essentials, accessories and toiletries during travel or home use. Easily fits all shaving kits, toothpastes, showering bathroom tools in this bag. Simply wipe clean with a damp cloth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel bag
reviews.reviewText: Got this for our vacation for my hubby and he loved it. It’s sturdy and great quality. Looks very nice and fits a lot in a nice organized fashion. Worth the money and was a great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Toiletry bag
reviews.reviewText: Great product for travel. The size fits perfect in a duffle bag or suitcase. The compartments are spacious and easy to find your items. The double zipper on top makes it easily assessable to items. The material is great quality, well made. Easy to clean because its water resistant. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My bf loved this
reviews.reviewText: It's very beautiful and is well made. It has lots of space and makes a wonderful gift. My bf put his shaving accessories in it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for the intended purpose
reviews.reviewText: We needed something to carry our GPS, chargers and sundry components for traveling.This works well. Nice double zipper pull and netting inside helps secure loose items.Nice looking and plenty of room for extra items you may need along the way.Highly recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: My husband loved this. Great quality for price and plenty of room for items. Has kept in great shape after many travels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice travel bag-spacious & good size
reviews.reviewText: Very nice travel bag. Very spacious for areas/places to put necessary items. Good size for travel too. It’s not huge given the awesome space in the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Men's Travel Bag
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened the package, I was disappointed with the product, but once transferring my stuff and using it for a while I found it is pretty nice. It is Lightweight, Flexible, and has several little compartments inside for storing small items. This is a nice men's travel toiletry bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super functional but not suitable for gifting
reviews.reviewText: PROS:- Super functional with lots of pockets and compartments- Wide top opening- Stands up on its own when filledCONS:- Ships flat in a see-through plastic bag and comes permanently wrinkled- Smell like dead fish- Top zipper is tricky to open/closeAll in all: Not bad for the price, but I would gladly pay more for the same level of functionality without the cons.
I am pleasantly surprised with the quality of this bag.Great quality, a lot of storage, nice size and great for full size toiletries.

reviews.reviewerName: Me llegaron dos tazas rotas del asa

reviews.reviewText: Llegó en el tiempo esperado. Mucho más bonita en vivo y de mejor calidad de lo esperado. Excelente tamaño y muy amplia y funcional. Todos los compartimentos muy útiles. Muy recomendable compra personal o para regalo.
